title: Developer
talk2: Armed with Flutter, Vue and Firebase
what: What I can do for you
whatText0: I fell in love with Flutter in mid-2021, since then I want to specify in Mobile Development, for now I use it to develop Android applications and my goal is to publish an app for both Android & iOS.
whatText1: I am focused on small to medium sized projects, depending on your needs and time. I am able to start a project from scratch or renewing your configuration on some technologies.
whatText2: I mainly work with Firebase and Heroku to provide the best cloud solutions but I also have experimented webhosting with FTP use.
whatText3: Inspired by UI/UX design trends, I prototype my projects with Figma. I try my best to implement latest trend design to provide the best appealing products.
lanya: Lanya is a website based on a typical e-shop layout, using the powerful tools provided by firebase and combined with Vue 2 to make a single page application. Link available soon
multitasky: Mültitaskÿ is a little project I did to test some Vuetify components and the Vue Leaflet module to manipulate maps. Available here :
fleeting: Fleeting was a big Symfony project that has been unfortunately canceled. Highly filtered registration, 1 to 1 messaging, one time payment and subscription. The unfinished design was made with Bootstrap 4.6
